articles.title: 'Biased' coverage of India: EAM Jaishankar takes dig at American media - India Today
articles.description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar took a swipe at the American media for their 'biased' coverage of India. He was addressing a gathering of Indian-Americans from across the country.
articles.content:
External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday took a dog on the mainstream American media, including The Washington Post, for their 'biased' coverage of India.
"I look at the media. You know, the… [+3456 chars]

articles.author: Tim Vickery
articles.title: Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay, Ecuador in pre-World Cup tests - ESPN
articles.description: South America's World Cup-bound sides were in action on Friday. What did we glean from performances from Argentina, Brazil, Ecuador, and Uruguay?
articles.content: South America's four World Cup-bound squads -- Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay and Ecuador -- were in all in action on Friday as they prepare for Qatar. While Brazil and Argentina had looked the part of t… [+7357 chars]
